EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.Confirmation - Minneapolis
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Minneapolis. See event details below:
Date: March 30, 2016 Time: 11:30 AM - 3:30 PM Location: EMC Eden Prairie, Training Room, 7480 Flying Cloud Drive, Third Floor, Eden Prairie, MN 55344
{{my.Save the Date Minneapolis}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]>.
